description: This file implements the core functions of a System Info Repository object, including creation, removal, enrollment of dependent objects, and initialization. It defines a create function that allocates memory and initializes member functions and properties, a remove function that releases resources, an enrollment function that sets up associated objects and interfaces, and an initialize function that sets default states and properties.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SysIroCreate(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Constructs and initializes a new Sys Info Repository object, setting up member functions and properties, and enrolling associated objects.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Destroys the Sys Info Repository object, freeing allocated resources and de-referencing interfaces.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroEnrollObjects(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Enrolls and sets up dependent objects such as the repository driver and IRA interface, initializing their properties.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysIroInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes member variables and function pointers of the Sys Info Repository object, setting default properties and states.
